item.title: The drain cover is sticking up, 26th September
item.description:
There is a drain cover sticking up in the disabled parking bay outside the Plumstead High Street Doctors Surgery. This was reported over a month ago and still nothing has been done . I am unable to send a photo as I am a receptionist at the surgery and this drain cover is causing problems with our disabled patients .
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Barth Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 67/69 Wiitham Road, 26th September
item.description:
The tree outside 67/69 Witham Road needs pruning. It has not been pruned since February 2022. Overhanging branches onto residential properties are causing slip hazard due to falling debris, cherries and leaves. Resident is elderly. As part of the Bromley Council three-year plan , please arrange for the to be cut back.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Witham Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement blocked due to overgrown shrubs/trees, 26th September
item.description:
It is impossible to pass safely on this road due to the narrowing caused by the telegraph pole and the trees/shrubs from number 32 which are out of control. I have a pushchair and either have to cross the road before (because there are always cars parked) or have to squeeze past what is a very small and quite prickly gap. I don't think this is safe for anyone with kids but even for adults, it creates a bottleneck and is unpleasant.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Gowlett Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
